prerequisite: Only a blackguard can take this paragon path.
name: Grim Blackguard
text: As you grow in power, the vice within you, already strong, takes a more prominent role. It begins to define your powers completely, and you must be strong to keep the viceâ€™s stain from affecting other aspects of your life.

features.grimBlackguard'sAction(11thLevel): You gain a feature associated with your vice
features.viceEncounterPower(11thLevel): You gain an encounter attack power associated with your vice
